Name: Amnon's Beginning
About the game: A battle that commends for the mind, will the mind be successful or unsuccessful in maintaining it's stability? Build your settlement and fight off the invader of this spiritual realm with real-time strategy. As simple thoughts invade the human mind so to is it like a battle to make the choices that transform our outcome in reality. This is the spiritual realm of the mind that wages a constant war for every thought will you be successful to flourish your settlement or will it go to ruin? Current Game Features: 1.) Settlement building 2.) Troop management 3.) Resource management 4.) Customize troop formations 5.) Research and unlock new buildings, troops, land bonuses, and hero's.
